title: Disciplining the Top Delinquent Bitch Through a Random Chatting App
description: "I think the girl I met through a random chatting app was the top delinquent bitch in my school..." The main character happened to meet the bitch who bullied him. A story where the main character exploits the girl's weakness to control her brings changes. He exploits her, her friend, and the family altogether.
author: Jonjal Insaeng
